初遇.encontent:
The BSA number? I'm ... I am so sorry, I don't have
 a number ... But I will make every effort to do my
 best. Trust me, please!
初遇.content:
童子军编号？我、我很抱歉，我没有编号……但我会尽全
力做到最好的，请您相信我。

箱中气候.encontent: It's cloudy again. What does Arlington look like now?
箱中气候.content: 又是阴天了，现在的阿灵顿，是什么样子呢？

致未来.encontent:
In the future, I hope both boys and girls can join
 the scouts, freely.
致未来.content:
我希望在未来，不论是男孩还是女孩，都可以自由地加入
童子军。

孑立.encontent:
I will make my plan even when the commander is not
 here.
孑立.content: 长官不在的时候，我也会制定好自己的计划。

朝晨.encontent: Good morning. Let me help you put the tent away, please.
朝晨.content: 早上好，让我帮您把帐篷收起来吧。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Good morning. I will sketch the way you wake up now
 in my diary.
信任-朝晨.content: 早上好，我会把您现在的样子如实地写进日记里面的。

夜暮.encontent:
Good evening. Please rest early. It's always right
 to have a regular schedule.
夜暮.content: 晚安。请您早点休息，规律的作息总是没错的。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
The stars ... They are so beautiful ... If I stay longer
 ...  No! No, we should all go to bed! Good night!
信任-夜暮.content:
今晚的星空……真美啊，真想再多看一会儿……不，不行
！我们都该休息了！祝您好梦！

袖与手.encontent:
If you want to get along with another Boy Scout, extend
 your left hand and firmly grasp their left hand. This
 is how we greet each other.
袖与手.content:
如果你想和另外一名童子军友好相处。就伸出你的手，向
对方做左握礼吧。这是我们童子军之间交流的暗号。

衣着与身形.encontent:
... I have my father's military badge in my necklace.
 It will lead my way.
衣着与身形.content:
……我的项链里放着父亲的军徽，它能带给我前进的力量
。

嗜好.encontent:
All the soldiers were collecting badges, so was father,
 wasn't he? When I collect enough badges, I will give
 him all of them.
嗜好.content:
士兵们都在收集徽章，父亲一定也一样吧？等我有了很多
的徽章，就全部送给他。

赞赏.encontent: Tough. Brave. Never give up. You've done a great job.
赞赏.content: 坚韧、勇敢、不轻言放弃。您做得非常好。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent: Yes, I'm here. Do you need my help?
闲谈Ⅰ.content: 是的，我在。您需要我的帮助吗？

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
I like photos very much. It's the Arcane Skill that
 allows people to "never fade." Let's take pictures
 together later.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
我很喜欢相片，这是能够让人“永不褪色”的神秘术。希
望我们以后有机会一起去拍照。

独白.encontent:
It is you who convinced me ... that even if I don't
 join the Boy Scouts, I could stand on my own.
独白.content:
多亏了您，才让我如此确信……即使我没有成为一名童子
军。我也依旧可以成为一名独当一面的人。

战前.encontent: I will assist you to keep the battle under control.

洞悉.encontent: ... Is this a reward for me?

洞悉之底.encontent:
Thank you for your appreciation, commander ... I will
 not stop making efforts.
洞悉之底.content: 感谢您的赏识，长官。……在此之后，我会继续努力的。
